briefdescription.para: generate inter-core interrupt the calling core will raise an interrupt to the target core
acknowledge the raised inter-core interrupt

parameterdescription.para: the core rasing the inter-core interrupt

briefdescription.para: read the status of inter-core interrupt

simplesect.para: 1 the inter-core interrupt is pending, 0 the inter-core interrupt is acknowledged

briefdescription.para: check the source of inter-core interrupt

generate halt request to cores in the system.
generate run request to cores in the system.

set the internal MASK reg in ICD the MASK register determines whether a global halt is triggered if a core is halted in response to one of the following events: core halt, actionpoint halt, self-halt, and breakpoint halt

parameterdescription.para: the cores for which the MASK register should be updated

briefdescription.para: read the internal MASK reg in ICD

parameterdescription.para: the cores for which the MASK register should be read

briefdescription.para: select cores that should be halted if the core issuing the command is halted
ead the internal SELECT register in ICD
read the status, halt or run,of all cores

read high 32-bit of gfrc

disable gfrc
set the relevant cores to halt the GFRC
read the status of gfrc
read the internal CORE register

read the internal PM register of the specified ARConnect group.

read the PUNCNT
